1370: Scilla moved to Scherbier straet.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Stemaers at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Aleberna in 1370 at age 17.
1372: Gave birth to Bobone in 1372 at age 19.
1373: Gave birth to Willekine in 1373 at age 20.
1374: Gave birth to Gertrudis in 1374 at age 21.
1377: Gave birth to Lutghardis in 1377 at age 24.
1379: Gave birth to Ghiselijn in 1379 at age 26.
1384: Gave birth to Wijfgode in 1384 at age 31.
1387: Lost son Gheuardus when Gheuardus was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Gheuardus in 1387 at age 34.
1389: Gave birth to Anselmi in 1389 at age 36.
1391: Gave birth to Wilmarus in 1391 at age 38.
1394: Lost son Wilmarus when Wilmarus was 4 years old.
1395: Lost son Anselmi when Anselmi was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1397: Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 20 years old.
